items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based finance tracker built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Users can manage income and expenses by adding, deleting, and viewing transactions. The app dynamically updates the balance and stores data locally, displaying default data even after a page reload.
